author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Just as Valve did with Wine in the Proton project, for the Steam Frame they're bringing a new project forward called FEX to play x86 games on the ARM based hardware of the headset.

==========Support The Channel==========
► Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon
► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay
► Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

Asahi Linux AAA: https://asahilinux.org/2024/10/aaa-gaming-on-asahi-linux/
Game Support: https://wiki.fex-emu.com/index.php/Category:Game_Type_Application
Proton Announcement: https://web.archive.org/web/20180902234258/https://steamcommunity.com/games/221410/announcements/detail/1696055855739350561<
title: Every Company In Open Source Should Behave Like Valve
